page.title: 14CRICKET CLUB,SPARSHOLT.
page.content: Sparsholt Cricket club offers the main activity in the village.The mens team is at the top of the Second Division of the Hampshire League.The adult team has been going since 1880 and the colts (boys' team) since 1981. I have been playing since March 1985. On Thursdays at 6.00p.m.I go to the cricket field for coaching.We learn how to bowl,catch and throw, after that we have a practice match.If it is raining we usually have coaching videos. On Sundays we play proper matches against other colt teams.I usually am the wicketkeeper or a deep-fielder because I have a strong throw and good aim. The Parish Council gave a grant for the new pavilion to be built,with a clause that youth cricket must be encouraged.This was opened in 1980 by Cecil Paris,a famous old cricketer.
